Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Stomach Diseases/Duodenogastric Reflux/Bile Reflux
Digestive System Diseases/Biliary Tract Diseases/Bile Reflux
Record.Description: Retrograde bile flow. Reflux of bile can be from the duodenum to the stomach (DUODENOGASTRIC REFLUX); to the esophagus (GASTROESOPHAGEAL REFLUX); or to the PANCREAS.
